mods.abstract: By issue 6, the Sweet Thursday's contributors' frustrations with the school authorities and their fellow students' apathy in the face of the Vietnam War and other social issues became very evident. Commentary included failures to open the pool on schedule, construction mishaps, student protests of same, pleas for student involvement, and concern about a high turnover rate in the faculty.

name.namePart: Michael J. Dean, Mike L. "Marty" Rice, Wayne Carrozza, James Coleman - staff members
